news_header: Jacek Pa.zka announces departure as CEO of Anora.
news_text: Jacek Pa.zka, the CEO of Anora, an alcohol company known for brands like Koskenkorva and Blossa, has informed the Board of Directors of his intention to leave. Pa.zka has been in the position for about a year. The Board will begin the search for a new CEO. Anora's Koskenkorva factory is situated in the Air River region of South O.bothnia.
